title: Marina del Rey
name: Fisherman's Village
content: Fisherman's Village is the center of recreational boating in the Marina, and a good place for water views.  Stroll along the cobblestone paths to enjoy views of the Marina.  You can join a public sport fishing excursion, or a weekend dinner or Sunday Brunch cruise. All kinds of small boats are available to rent by the hour - sail or motor, kayaks, stand-up paddle boards, and jet skis, and parasailing and bike rentals are also offered there. There are a small number of waterfront restaurants and a few souvenir shops.  Free weekend concerts on Saturday and Sunday afternoons are a local favorite.  Open daily; validated 2 hour parking (Admiralty Way south; turn right on Fiji Way.)
